main event: Two pilots observed a round object in the sky that was gray or white, estimated to be about 25 feet in diameter.
interesting points: The object hovered at an altitude of 15,000 feet before descending to about 8,000 feet,The sighting lasted for about 15 to 20 minutes,The observers were pilots of a Civil Air Patrol plane,One pilot stated the object was previously over the area at about 30,000 feet,The conclusion of the observation was that it was likely a weather balloon.
sighted object: round object resembling a weather balloon
witness description: pilots from a Civil Air Patrol plane
